body:
I intended for it to delegate to the kV store it was decorating, but I
probably miscoded it to call itself... Im not in front of laptop right now
if you want to push quick fix.

Marty
On Apr 3, 2015 7:29 PM, "Steve Yen" notifications@github.com wrote:

> Using bleve with the recent BytesSafeAfterClose() optimization (commit
> 11262c7
> https://github.com/blevesearch/bleve/commit/11262c793f1d6cf3afe86f18c42d67a348509766),
> and with the bleve metrics KVStore wrapper (around leveldb), I somehow got
> an infinite loop.
> 
> btw, I was playing around with field based boosting search, like
> "title:PR-2341^" when the infinite loop happened... not sure if that's
> related.
> 
> Unfortunately, goroutine stack dump seems to have elided the most
